title: nur1labs
author: nur1labs
content: hello guys i need someone talk to me how to release or out this situation about kaspa Profit ROI since now is decreased so much per monthly. around 1-4 august $1650 /day now decreased to 12 august $832 /day and as we know KS3 coming this august. did anyone has solution? cause after BEP it's become 2 month before is 1 monthany idea open for solution fixed this like how many need i buy the KS3 to ROI reach 1 month without adding anymore 1 Machine. or we have hope if Kaspa price is peak. so i need you guys explain solution how much miner i have first and since i have 10k KWH for my place.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: nur1labs on August 13, 2023, 06:04:57 AMhello guys i need someone talk to me how to release or out this situation about kaspa Profit ROI since now is decreased so much per monthly. around 1-4 august $1650 /day now decreased to 12 august $832 /day and as we know KS3 coming this august. did anyone has solution? cause after BEP it's become 2 month before is 1 monthany idea open for solution fixed this like how many need i buy the KS3 to ROI reach 1 month without adding anymore 1 Machine. or we have hope if Kaspa price is peak. so i need you guys explain solution how much miner i have first and since i have 10k KWH for my place.Ok we are at 8 PH now, some days before we were at 4 PH and in 1 or 2 months we are at 45 PH and by end of the year we are at 80 - 100 PH -> so don´t buy anything, you will loose.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.created_time: August 13, 2023, 04:37:32 PMLast edit: August 27, 2023, 02:09:15 PM by FP91G
comments.body: BITMAIN ANTMINER KS3 is already mining Kaspa coinhttps://www.hashrate.no/asics/ks3https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-ks3-8-3thThis is what the growth of mining difficulty tells ushttps://2miners.com/kas-network-difficultyWith an MSRP of $49,800, this is a serious investment, although the ASIC is already cheaper because its profit is falling every day.If you want to pay back the equipment in 1 month, then this is not a feasible idea. For 9 years in mining, I have not seen this.The miners made a good profit because they did not sell their coins for several years. I would not buy ANTMINER KS3.

BAM we got nothing. even we got paying back on 3-5 month this crazy. when i tell this to newbie. "just doing work for fast". well we miners got bad or good way cause the market too. Paying back on 3-5 month is still a good result, but you need to watch the mining difficulty. I think that soon the payback of these asics will be a year or more, and the worst thing is that many inexperienced miners have these asics on the way. And when they receive them, they will have to wait a long time for payback on such equipment.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: ASIC Antminer KS3 fell in price by 2 timeshttps://shopbitmain.com/product/antminer-ks3-kas-miner/Appear new version of ASICNew Bitmain Antminer KS3 9.4Th/s (KAS) Miner☑️9,4 th☑️3500wThe company also revealed that a new batch of KS3 is on its way. This will feature an optimized hashrate and superior energy efficiency. Specifically, the KS3 will provide 9.4T of power, consume 3500W, and operate at 0.37J/G. Consequently, miners can look forward to more robust performance.https://coinmarketcap.com/community/articles/64e38c55fe513f74970174bc/
